title: Inspirational teachers transform students from passive listeners into intrepid explorers: LG Sinha
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Feb 3: Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha today emphasised the need for forward-thinking teachers who can equip students for tomorrow’s uncertainties, like Artificial Intelligence (AI) disruptions, climate shifts, inspire to pioneer breakthroughs and fuel a dynamic and innovation-driven economy. The Lieutenant Governor was speaking at the “Inspirational Teachers Award” ceremony at Padma Padma Sachdev Government College for Women, Gandhi Nagar, Jammu. At the ceremony, a total of 101 best inspirational teachers from various schools across Jammu were honoured […]

title: SpaceX to Acquire xAI in Landmark Merger Uniting Musk’s Tech Empire
description: In a move that reads like science fiction but lands firmly in corporate reality, SpaceX to acquire xAI marks Elon Musk’s latest step toward consolidating his vast constellation of companies. SpaceX confirmed it is taking over xAI, the artificial intelligence startup behind the Grok chatbot, publishing a memo from Musk announcing the merger. Financial terms SpaceX to acquire xAI in $125B deal uniting AI, rockets and Musk’s tech empire vision.

title: More companies are pointing to AI as they lay off employees
description: Although economists have generally downplayed the impact of artificial intelligence on jobs, some employers are highlighting their adoption of AI.
content:
